channel.title: New Visual Studio 2010 Video Podcast 10-4
channel.description: Brian Keller (of This Week on Channel 9 fame) has just announced a new weekly show on Channel 9 called 10-4 where you can learn about what's coming in Visual Studio 2010 and the .NET Framework 4.0. http://channel9.msdn.com/shows/10-4/ Each...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Eric Matz+00:00
item.description: Great summary, Martin. I think if you're diligent about reviewing your pending changes (which we all should be), having auto checkout enabled won't be a problem. That being said, the VS IDE has a habit of making files writable (and therefore checking them out) without your knowledge, and I find it nice to know when that's happening.
item.dc:creator: Eric Matz

item.title: Comment by Ross+00:00
item.description: These year planners are fantastic! Thanks for putting them up.
item.dc:creator: Ross

item.title: Comment by Len Ocin+00:00
item.description: I do not know how others *not* make the mistake of accidentally checking out files you don't want, and not notice it. (Or maybe it's just me being so accident prone) This definitely will save a lot of agony in our team.
item.dc:creator: Len Ocin
